titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding a copy and translation of a firman from Abbas Meerza [Abbas Mirza], Prince Royal of Persia, requesting that Bruce persuade Mr Armstrong to return to the Prince's service. The translation only is included. Bruce reports that he informed the Prince of the fact that Mr Armstrong is now working in Bombay.
